item.title: andy1 page
item.description: Hey this is a standalone page. this is a standalone page. this is a standalone page. this is a standalone page. this is a standalone page. this is a standalone page. subscection OK OK another section We’ve created our first website page, which can be accessed via the http://localhost:1313/bands/metallica/ URL. Let’s look at how thisURL is being composed. http://localhost:1313 is thebase URL. In the development environment, it points to localhost , whereas in production it has the value specified under the baseURL optioninside the config.
